Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute near 71st/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 67 67th-69th-71st buses temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st/Hamlin, due to police activity near 71st/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#67 67th-69th-71st buses temporarily rerouted in both directions near 71st/Hamlin, due to police activity near 71st/Hamlin.

Eastbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses will operate via 71st, Pulaski, Marquette, Kedzie, 71st and over regular route.

Westbound #67 67th-69th-71st buses will operate via 71st, Kedzie, Marquette, Pulaski, 71st and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
